name: Flame Guard
desc: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.

name: Chakra Magic
desc: Restores mana to the target unit, increases its mana capacity, and reduces the cooldown of the next spell they cast.

name: Reactive Armor
desc: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.

name: Ink Swell
desc: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After 3 seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how much ink tendril damage was inflicted to heroes.

name: Lucent Beam
desc: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

name: Refraction
desc: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.

name: Bristleback
desc: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

name: Hand of God
desc: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.

name: Summon Wolves
desc: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Cripple, and level 4 wolves have permanent invisibility.

name: Searing Chains
desc: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
